attributes.action: Make teacher's purchases of ICT equipment tax deductible.
attributes.background: Allow teachers to claim tax back on ICT purchases like laptops, web cams, microphones and visualisers. These are a necessity in the current covid climate.

rejection.details: You can already claim tax relief for equipment bought to do your job. You can find out more about this relief and how to claim for it here: https://www.gov.uk/tax-relief-for-employees/buying-other-equipment
